extDescription.message: Track your work time, and posts to Redmine server.

dialogRemoveAccountConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to remove the account?

dialogRemoveAccountConfirmTicket.message: Tickets in projects will also be removed from select list.

dialogRemoveAccountConfirmRedmine.message: Data on the redmine server does not change.

msgRequestAddAccount_0.message: First, please set your Redmine account.

msgRequestAddAccount_1.message: If authentication succeeds, tickets will be displayed.

msgRequestInputURL.message: Please input the Redmine Server URL.

msgNotFoundError.message: Can not find the page on server.

msgUrlFormatError.message: Format of the URL is incorrect.

msgShortTime.message: More than one minute is required.

msgCannotFetchProject.message: Projects to get has not been set on {{arg0}}. Please check the account settings.

msgLoadQueryFail.message: Failed to load custom queries on {{arg0}}.

msgLoadStatusesFail.message: Failed to load statuses of issue on {{arg0}}.

msgCommentTooLong.message: Comment is too long (maximum is 255 characters)
